pullRequest.title: Fix ByteBuf leaks in HaProxyMessageEncoderTest
pullRequest.bodyText:
Motivation:
We need to ensure we not leak in tests. We did see some leaks reported related to HaProxyMessageEncoderTest on our CI.
Modifications:

Use readSlice(...) and so not create new ByteBuf instances that need to be released

Result:
No more leaks

commit.message:
Fix ByteBuf leaks in HaProxyMessageEncoderTest

Motivation:

We need to ensure we not leak in tests. We did see some leaks reported related to HaProxyMessageEncoderTest on our CI.

Modifications:

- Use readSlice(...) and so not create new ByteBuf instances that need to be released

Result:

No more leaks

nodes.bodyText: readBytes(...) creates a new ByteBuf which needs to be released. readSlice returns a ByteBuf that shares the same reference count as the original buffer and so not need to be released
